PlayHouse

About Us

Once upon a time... Paper House got its name from our very first products, made way back in 1983. The six diecut greeting cards were actually photographs of dollhouses! Almost 40 years later we’ve grown, evolved, and branched out into planners, paper crafting, gifts, and even a kid’s line! Stickers, stickers, and more stickers! Since 2012, we’ve produced over 30 million 3D stickers! That’s enough stickers to cover the Empire State Building and the Statue of Liberty…. and still have lots leftover to craft with! :: We're a family. ::


Our Mission

We value Fun. Our reason for being is to help people express themselves and to encourage creativity. We believe anyone can make ‘things’ – but it’s the personalities and passions of our team that make us stand out.
